content.detailedDescription: George moses,his wife,my girlfriend and i were standing in george's front yard.His wife was talking to my girlfriend about 15 feet away from us and george and i were talking when george was looking up and asked me what was that as he pointed up in the sky above us.I looked up and said it was getting smaller as if going straight up and as we were watching it get smaller,yet visible,it stopped and shot to the right so fast that the two of us looked at each other in almost shock.I told him that what ever that was,it is definitely something that we don't have cause we don't have anything that can move that fast.Whatever it was,it was black in color against the clear blue sky's.I told george not to tell anyone what we saw cause they'd only think that were crazy.In my opinion,it is foolish to believe that we are the only life in the many universes out there.In fact it's totally vain.I haven't seen nor heard from george in about 11yrs.So if you'd like to verify my claims for validity,i'd ask george in hawaii.I have lived up here in the mainland since 2004 and like i said i don't know where he is,but i'm sure he's in hawaii somewhere's.As the years go by,i'm sure we will see a lot more sightings cause they're just watching us and who knows why.Some how i believe they probably figured out how to utilize smaller nuclear explosions to propel they're crafts.All i know it's awesome to actually see it for yourself and realize how far behind man is to they're knowledge.It's probably because we waste to much energy and resourses fighting with one another thay we don't see the big picture,which is to find our creator,travel and find new worlds and universes.
content.summary: My friend george moses pointed up at a black dot and asked me what it was and it started getting smaller then in a snap of a finger it shot to the right and was gone.Shy was clear at the time.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out of the house to take the garbage out. glanced up at the night sky straight overhead, and the very moment i looked up, there was this huge light flash way up in the sky, and then nothing. i heard nothing, saw nothing more.  the span of the light was too big and too high up to have been a landing light from a plane. some may call it a "blink" but it was only one blink and it was not like a twinkle. the flash was huge, it covered an enormous portion of the sky for that one second.
content.summary: A huge flash of light way up very high

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on us-41 near lomira, wi and while observing some unusual clouds i noticed what looked like a white rod or possibly the edge of a white disc towards the east. it looked very solid and straight and i could see both ends of it. i was able to take 2 photographs of the object and then lost site of it as i drove south.
content.summary: White rod or edge of white disc over fondulac county wisconsin

content.detailedDescription:
i was outside helping my dad washing the car around 5pm and around 6:20 we were done. we had nothing to do ,so my dad started to talk about the stars and planets in the sky. we stared at the stars then a plane flew just north and  i stared at it then my dad said to look up. i saw this light that was white and that the airplane flew close to it. after the plane left, the light started to move slowly to the west. when it started to move, it changed from white to blue. my dad said that it is nothing like he had ever seen. the blue light changed course to thee south rapidly and for awhile the blue light disappeared. my dad was telling me that it was not a satellite, a plane, or a comet. we kept looking at the sky then another plane flew near, then i saw three dim blue light shaped as a triangle. as the plane flew south the triangular shaped blue light flew east towards dallas and then rapidly in a second, the lights turned white and disappeared. i ran inside trying to get my camera ,but the battery was low. i ran back on the driveway at i looked north if i can try to see the light for about 20 minutes ,but the lights never reappeared.
 the first sighing was a white light that stayed in the same position then it started to move west. then turned blue and turned to go to the south an disappeared.
 the second sighting was when a a plane passed from dfw airport flew over head to the north then three blue dim lights moved toward the east which came from the west which looked as if it passed near the plane. after 3 seconds of looking at it, it disappeared.
 non of us can identify it.I will just tell you it was not a comet because comets cannot disappear, they can't change color and can't change direction rapidly. it was not a satellite ,a helicopter or a plane. what do think it was.
content.summary: Triangle ufo and strange light

content.detailedDescription: On january 8, 2010 around 6 pm i was closing the blinds on the back windows of my house (facing east) as the sun was setting when i noticed a bright orb in the sky. unsure what to make of it i stood observing it for several minutes trying to figure out what i was looking at. i knew it wasn't a star since we live in a suburb in the san antonio area and we have a pretty good view of the sky every night without the glare of city lights. it began to float very slowly to the left so i ran to grab my camera and took a picture. soon after it faded rather quickly and i lost sight of it so i decided to keep the blinds open to see if it reappeared. about an hour later it reappeared further away with the same intensity but then faded and began to blink similar to the lights of a plane, red, white, blue, green, yellow. it flew very slowly across the sky continuing to blink and then two more similar objects appeared around it. my husband arrived home from work and i told him about what i was seeing and he observed them with me. we just stood trying to figure out what was going on. we phoned our neighbor who lives one street over and she told us she could see them from her front yard. over the next couple of hours they would appear and disappear from starlike objects that would glare up brighter than any of the stars around and then blinking colored lights flying across the sky. the strange thing is that this has happened every night for the past week in the same area and as many as 5 will appear at one time, each slowly fading out. i keep my camera handy but they are not easy to take a clear picture of.
content.summary: Orb like ufos that mimic planes

content.detailedDescription: For about 10 minutes i watched what looked like a star blink every 7 seconds. it looked very high up in the sky and roughly the same brightness as your average star.  the light move very little and stayed in the same spot and eventually go dimmer and went away...
content.summary: I watched a white light blink in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
on the night of the 10th of january, 2010 at around 6:30pm, while i was walking my dog near my driveway. i was looking at the stars like i do most nights, and i noticed an odd pulsating or twinkling light off to the west, towards ithaca new york. at the time i thought it might have been an aircraft with it's landing lights on. i went inside to grab the camera, a fujifilm s5000, thinking i might be able to get a good picture of it. i zoomed into the object under maximum zoom, 10 times optical and 2.2 times digital, and proceeded to use a pine tree to somewhat stabilize the image with near zero success. i took several pictures of the object and one video over a span of 15 to 20 minutes. 

    i brought my father out who also saw the object, commenting it was probably a plane. i'm an avid flight simmer, rc pilot, and looking forward to a career in aviation; needless to say i have a good grasp of what planes and helicopters can and can not do, and what colors are used in aircraft navigation lights. from what i can see from my pictures the object had lights or various blues, whites, yellows, reds, and greens. blue is not used in aircraft navigation lights, nor could a mix of any of the colors that are used result in a blue light. during the sighting an airplane did fly by, a very common occurrence in my area of upstate new york. i could clearly see the airplane's anti-collision strobe lights, the object looked nothing like those. there are no cell phone or radio towers in that direction that are visible from my location.

   during the 15-20 minutes i watched the object though both the camera and with my own eye it never moved, it just kind of hovered over the hill (i'm sure it was some distance beyond the hill, but it looked like it was over it to me). it continued to pulsate different intensities of whiteish light and sit right where it was for the duration of the viewing. at no time did i feel at all like i was threatened, more an intense curiosity of what exactly the object was.

   at about this time, roughly 6:45pm, i headed back inside to try to warm up, when i headed back outside about a half hour later the object, which had stayed still for nearly 20 minutes, was gone. i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Spotted odd "pulsating" light from the driveway

content.detailedDescription: My son went out with his telescope to set it up because it is a clear night to do some star gazing. as he was setting up, he noticed two bright objects in the sky. they are in the eastern sky. not close to each other at all. they can be seen with the naked eye. looking in the telescope you can see that the objects are in the shape of a circle. the one on the right is much larger than the other one. they appear to be moving but at a very slow rate. they are rapidly changing colors. this has been ongoing for about 30 minutes now and my son is still outside watching them through the telescope.
content.summary: My son took telescope outside after seeing two objects in the sky. they are in the eastern sky. they are both moving slowly and the colors are bright and changing.

content.detailedDescription:
They are both moving slowly. they are both changing colors rapidly. the colors are basically our primary colors. as i am sending in this report, my son is still outside monitoring the objets with his telescope. he is also trying to take a photo with my camera.
my son took out the telescope because it is a clear night and we hadn't looked at the stars lately. that is when he noticed the objects. you can see them with the naked eye but they are much clearer through the telescope. my son is still outside watching the objects and he wanted me to go ahead and report what we were seeing. he and i think that they are ufo's. if they are not, we would like to know what they are. they have never been there before.
content.summary: My son took telescope outside after seeing two objects in the sky. they are in the eastern sky. they are both moving slowly and the colors are bright and changing.

content.detailedDescription: This report was initially received by mufon dispatch on 1-11-10. referral to fi by email with attachment of photographs.  email sent to rp on 1-11-10.  phone message requesting telephonic interview left on 1-12-10./mcm
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I work at edwards afb and in the morning there was an unusually bright star to the right of the moon, flashing red, blue, green, white. i got out my binoculars and i dont think it was a star, seems other folks have reported the same event from different states. not sure how long it lasted because i had to get to a meeting. sure wish i had my telescope and camera set up.
content.summary: Multi colored flashing object.

content.detailedDescription: Here is an enhanced image for you to go buy. if you need any help with these let me know. alienhunters01@live.Com
content.summary: N response to case 21454 re:

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Webcamufo.Com/phoenixesmo.Html

that is the link where it was viewed.
watching cam for about 25 min when i noticed it pop out of the side. i have included a photo with enhancements for your records. we have kept our own records on this event. figured i should report to you guys since i have no way of traveling down there my self.
content.summary: Found while viewing live cam from webcam ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen looking outside and i saw a strange cloud formation.  i grabed my camera a took two photos of what seemed like an invisible trinagle surrounded by clouds.  i did not think much of it because i went back inside and brushed it off. the time was about 3pm. later in the year many people were reporting triangle typed ufos throughout the world and i remembered taking the photo of the invisible triangle shaped oddity.  i have seen alot strange things in the sky lately but it always seems that i do not have my camera nearby.
content.summary: Clear blue sky with cloud surrounding blue triangle

content.detailedDescription: Well, where do i start.. well, me and a friend of mine decided to go get a bite to eat.. so we were driving thru my neighborhood to go to rabertos taco shop, right around the corner from where i live.. so we took back streets to get there.. as we turned on one street we both saw an object flowting right over power lines.. the object was not moving flowting over a fire deparment on a street called flamingo.. well me and my friend both saying what is that, so we started to name what it could be.. a blimp a helicopter, ect.. and all of a sudden this thing cocked back so fast.. it looked like if someone was pulling back a slingshot, was almost instent,  this thing took of so fast that it was living a green trail behind it as it was flying away.. kind of looked like lightning. we were both looking at each other saying no way that just happend.. we knew for a fact that was not a plane or anything we had ever saw.. i reported it in to some web page back in the day.. thay weren't to mutch help.. but years went by and always wanted to write to someone professionals to talk about it but never knew who to write to.. i have seen ufo hunter on tv but there was no investigators to write to back then..(well none that i new of) but i always talk about it and everyone though we were nuts and never belived us.. i wish we had a camera or something that night. but who thinks about these things when u get a bite to eat right.. i never belived in ufos untill that night... but still from this day im questioning my self was it alien or military.. im glad a friend was with me that night so i wouldn't have to share it alone.. but yea what the hell is going on?
content.summary: Disc shaped with glowing yellow with blinking red, green, blue lights on the bottom, glowing in a  circular motion.

content.detailedDescription: My 17yo daughter was taking me into work so she could drive to school that day. i am very observant of the skies these days , i looked at the cresent moon and yelled at alicia to look, i asked her if she saw the flashing star on the tip of the cresent moon and she did, we pulled over on the shoulder of the road and i told her to start taking pictures. i called my girlfriend whom i was going to give her a ride to work too and told her what i was seeing and to go look at the moon. i asked my daughter if the flashing star looked red to her and she said yes. we drove very slow down the mountain and i took pics with my cell phone too.When we got down to the bottom of the mountain the star appeared to be further away from the tip of the cresent moon and it was a white star. i went to work and looked out on the back porch and there was a star still further away but i think this was a normal star.My first thought was a ufo because i have had some unusual sightings of unexplainable lights since april of 2009 and several years ago too.The red flashing light was on the lower tip of the crescent moon. i dont remember any certain rythm of flashing.At times i thought it was flashing white. we pulled off the road a couple of times to get pictures and being a wooded area we only had full view here and there. when we got to the bottom of the mountain and down the road a ways , i asked alicia if the light appeared further away from the moon and i think she agreed, i was still very excited. i dont think my friend could see anything . i will call her today and get her details because i feel the need to start writing this down in a journal. i cant download pics now but we do have them on our phones and camera. i havent had a good look at the pics on the camera because i was very tired yesterday and rested all the evening.
content.summary: Red flashing star on tip of cresent moon

content.detailedDescription:
This was not a one time event. this happened over a period of three weeks approximately for three hour periods and was witnessed by myself , kids and neighbours. we all reported the incident including to nasa in the usa but could not get any action. these ufo's were intelligent with no doubt because they would be flying across the sky at a rate too incredible to be man made.They zig zagged and played with each other and were in the sky doing random tricks. what surprised me was the sighting was above and near the air force base and there was no reaction. we begged the media to come down but they showed no interest. what also surprised me was that these ufo's were flying well below cloud level at times and were roughly the size of a small aircraft. the craft's as sometimes there were up to 5 ufo's at one time were a 3 dimensional disc with an orb at the base which appeared to hang below the object but not joined to the disc, the orb was a very bright light. the crafts shone light and had no colour.  i am commissioned as a youth missionary through the church and my family are christians. this account is true in every aspect of what we witnessed. i have aspergers syndrome and i am very sensitive to movement in my peripheral vision, the movement of the objects in the sky caught my attention almost immediately. at the time i was outside praying. when i first noticed the object it soon became apparent that it was intelligent in relation to it's movement and too fast to be anything man made, i know this because jumbo jets going to australia fly over head and takes a couple of minuets for the plane to disappear over the horizon where these objects could fly across the sky as far as i could see in about 2-3 seconds. so i knew almost instantly what they were or were not. my reaction to this was that they were probably evil and possibly related to the objects mentioned in the first chapter of ezekiel in the bible.
the objects at the end just flew and disappeared out of sight. how ever they always appeared from the  direction of the pot formation of stars .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Circular with orb at base not appearing to be joined to the top disc

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work in the dallas area at 5:45 am on january 11 2010 and i noticed the moon.  there was what appeared to be something blocking out the bottom tip of the crescent moon.  further out from where the tip of the crescent moon would have extended was a white light.  the obaque object "sat" staionary from the time i left my house to the time i got to work (approx. 30 minutes).  i came back outside after the sun had come up with a coworker and it was gone.  never seen anything like it.  that afternoon, there was an abundance of chemtrails also.  atleast 10-15.  i attached a rendering of what i saw.  this is not a photo.
content.summary: Ufo in front of moon

content.detailedDescription: Short duration of flashing light. horizon at 45 degrees in the west.
content.summary: Blinking light

content.detailedDescription:
my husband was standing outside in our front yard looking east and saw bright flash of white light.  about half a minute later he saw it again in the same place.  he continued watching and about a minute later he saw it a third time and he watched for another five minutes and it did not repeat.  that was sometime in the first week of august.
     a couple weeks later, my husband was again looking into the sky but south this time, around the same time of night as the first sighting.  this time when the flash happened it was the same but perhaps farther away.  it is hard to say what distance though because it was very high up, like a star but much brighter, and bigger.  but the second one seemed "deeper" somehow.  this time there was only two flashes about about 30 seconds apart roughly.
     about a week of hearing him talk about it and we had had a bar b q and evening was getting on, this probably getting towards the end of august, it was mostly dark and my brother says, "i think i just saw that light your husband was talking about!"  and he proceeded to ask my husband if it was real bright and white, and he said yes, and my brother pointed to where he saw it, towards the north but almost directly above us, and we all looked and almost a minute had passed since he first said he saw something and then it lit up again and my brother, husband, and i all saw the second flash and to me it looked very white but also metalic, like the old strobe lights with the silver behind the light that would give it that silvery glare.  and it was very bright and bigger than a star but somehow looked very high up like the stars.  my brother said it looked like it was still in the same place, then after about 20-30 seconds we saw it again in the same place, but we watched for a long time and did not see it again.
     then three or four weeks ago my husband came into the house and was excited.  he said that he saw the same light again, this time closer in, but still not close, meaning still looking like a too large and bright star, but not as "deep" as the second time, but about the same as the first but this time in the southern part of the sky.  he saw it flash four times this time and it did not move in the sky.  it was right after dusk and there were not very many stars out yet but there was one brighter one in the southern sky and this flash was occuring directly above it about half an inch.  he states that the time passing between each flash ranged from half a minute to a minute and a half and the whole episode lasted about five minutes.  i went outside and watched with him for a few minutes but neither of us saw it happen again.  i called my friend that lives near us who also is an investigator for mufon and told her about it.  she arrived at my house within fifteen minutes and i showed here where my husband said he saw it and we watched for a while and flashed that area with a laser but to no avail.  we did not see it again that night nor since.  
     we live in a very remote area in california and therefore have a very good view of the skies that we take advantage of regularly.  we see a lot of planes, many satalites, helicoptors...Even the space station and know how to recognize these types of things.  this flashing light does not resemble none of those things.  the strangest thing about it being the time between each flash being irregular, and also, that it does not move even after longer than three or four minutes.  i say three because the longest time my husband thinks it took was five minutes, but we all know how time goes when you are waiting for the pot to boil...
     that is our account of the activities to the best of our being able to describe them without having actually written it down when it happened.  we will try to keep better details if we ever see it again though.

There was a bright light high over the miami skyline - which isn't unusual considering the amount of air traffic, however, living with a front row view of the skies for several years, this one wasn't moving and seemed out of place.  

to the naked eye, the craft seemed to have a front green light and a pyramid shaped (or cone shaped) body which was larger in the rear with white, green and blue lights, but seemed to also change in size and form.  

the craft moved from one side of the skyline to the other, seeming to be very very high in the sky.

at times, it seemed to be more of a fireball, however the change in it's distance from us was readily visible as it continued to move over the sky.

then it suddenly disappeared.  completely gone from the sky. approx. 2 minutes later something, perhaps the same or another craft, appeared further to the west.  so, we grabbed the camcorder.    it was easy to see how the craft was moving in directions which are not the same as that of an airplane.  it would change in distance as well as drift up and down in altitude and east/west in direction.  after watching for about 20 minutes, it's still moving around and continuing to hover.  

we are continuing to watch it from the bedroom with our binoculars and if anything major arises, we'll report back!

(video is large and will be uploaded to youtube)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Forward facing pyramid / fireball

content.detailedDescription:
You guys need to contact me. my friend and i had a sighting over the skies of los angles (we were in pico rivera looking due west) on the night of sunday jan. 10th.  it appeared to have a striking resemblance to footage i have seen on your show (.  3 bright lights that appeared to be planes coming in for a landing, but when they started to hover in the sky we knew they weren't planes and when the intensity of lights began to alter while they formed a perfect triangle in the sky we knew that they were something we've never seen before. a perfect trangle.....
they all dimmed and left in the same direction at the same intervals.  2 lights reappeared on my way home and i pulled over to watch them for about 3-4 minutes and i still have no explanation. no noise, plenty of other air traffic to give me a reference.  i was basically shaking after the first time we watched them, unbelievable.  they were able to go from a dim light to easily the brightest thing in the sky in a matter of seconds. why did they form a perfect triangle? i've watched a good amount of ufo footage and the like and never, ever thought i would ever see anything like this in my entire life.  it was absolutely amazing because it reminded me very much of some footage i've seen on your show on a ufo in texas?  the speed of these objects when they left and the way they changed light intensity was crazy.  it's still very fresh in my mind, i'll never forget this. my friend found a report online that seemed to corroborate what we saw. (4 of us saw it, 2 at first). i watched them for maybe 5-7 minutes.  thanks and good luck with your show, it's starting to strike home with me now.  it's funny, it actually really didn't surprise me after i began to think about it. people have been seeing ufo's for a long time. i just never thought it would be this blatant and this amazing right here in pico rivera with that much light pollution.  thanks again for your time. i can give a word for word description of what happened at any time. the events will never go away in my mind, i hope someone out there shot some video.  

i sent this to ufo hunters and just found your website.  the most amazing thing about this was that they were able to go from the intensity of a dim star to a light that was 10 times brighter than any helicopter or plane in the sky and they all left in the same direction.  incredible.

1. i was standing on my friends front porch smoking a cigarette.
2. i first noticed what looked like 3 planes coming towards us from the west, the intensity of light is what made me first notice it.
3. i didn't know what it was, i asked my friend and he said it could be air traffic from lax, but when they stopped in the sky and and slightly reconfigured themselves to form a perfect triangle is when i became suspect.
4. i think i've covered this.
5. i was shaking, i couldn't control my thoughts.  i called my friend who has a similar mindset when it comes to these things and all he could say was "cms/tg/pd]".
6. the 3 objects disappeared in the same direction, with it's light decreasing as it moved south across the sky and out of view. the last one got really bright for a period then went in the same direction as the other two.
content.summary: 3 u.F.O's in the night sky, changing intensity of illumination and creating a triangle with the other objects

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday morning january 10, 2010, at 9:45 a.M. i was standing in my kitchen looking out the window drinking a cup of coffee.  the kitchen window looks out over a creek a woods.  i was watching a red squirrel moving from tree to tree when, out of the corner of my eye i spotted three white birds flying from west to east.  i was curious about what kind of bird i was seeing, thinking they were probably sea gulls.  i focused in on the birds and they weren't birds at all.

when i turned my attention to what i thought were birds, i saw a dark grey triangular object.  the tips of the triangle were glowing with a white light - what i originally thought were birds.

obviously the object was moving at the speed of a bird.  a fixed winged object of this size would fall out of the sky at this speed.  there was no sound and if it was a helicopter i would have heard the rotors and engine.  

i observed the object through the tops of the trees.  i estimate the object was a half mile away to my south flying over an open field.  my thumb extended at arms length would not have covered up the object but a tennis ball would have covered it.  i estimate the object was approximately 500 feet above the open field.

i observed the object for about 20 seconds when it left my field of view.

when i was in college i was in the student flying club.  i've flown fixed wing aircraft and i'm an avid airplane watcher.  i've never seen anything like this.  i've searched my mind for rationale explanations for what i saw and i come up with nothing that makes sense.
content.summary: I observed a dark grey triangle object with the tips of the triangle glowing in a white light.

content.detailedDescription:
Response to : "this morning while driving to work, i saw a bright white (planet sized) object that was stationary with the moon.	co, us		jan112010.Jpg"

i saw this posted just now. i also saw this bright light by the moon, in the exact position and thought it was a little out of place. orion's belt was near, so i assumed it must have been a star in that constellation and didn't think anything further of it until now.
content.summary: Similar sighting

content.detailedDescription: This morning while driving to work, i saw a bright white (planet sized) object that was stationary with the moon. i live in the denver area, and was traveling south on 470 to i25 south (0555). the object was as bright as venus would be, and was 2 degrees to the right of the moon in a stationary orbit. i kept an eye on the object that was in the same position relative to the moon (2 degrees). the object stayed in the same position to the moon for the duration of the observation (1hour).  after traveling on i 25 south until 0700 the object disappeared with the moon as the sun came up. from an educated guess the object was probably very large as it was in the moons shadow, and did not fade or move. the object could have been at the same position before and after my observation.  my other guess is it was a mother ship from the size. i usually see at least 1 ufo a week in this area of colorado. i reported this object as it was very differnt, and easier to not dispute.
content.summary: This morning while driving to work, i saw a bright white (planet sized) object that was stationary with the moon.

content.detailedDescription: Was out side with my dad fixing a sprinkler valve around 9:40am when i was looking at the sky. i was scanning around when i looked towards the north near a strip of cloud. just above the cloud line i noticed a similar object from this past saturday. it was that same yellowish white coloration as before and almost blended into the clouds. i watched it travel eastward above the clouds when i pointed it to my dad and he watched it move too. my sister joined us and we all watched as it moved at a pretty quick speed. as the object went behind a light post in front of our neighbors house we watched to spot it as it passed. but to all of our amazement it never came out from behind it as it disappeared from a relatively clear sky.
content.summary: Yellowish white sphere

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were taking a friend to their house in nortonville around 9:30 central time.  we had just entered a small town called little valley, an area between earlington and nortonville when we saw the "ufo".  both my boyfriend and i saw two lights up in the air and quickly looked up.  it was a white craft, shaped like missile, and had two white lights attached.  at first, for a split second, i thought it was a plane or something, but then it dove down from the sky as if had crashed into something.  there were no noises, no crash sounds, no evidence that it had even touched ground.  we kept driving, trying to collect ourselves, and as we drove back after dropping him off, we saw nothing else out of the norm.
content.summary: Seen while driving

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting started as we were going home after attending saturday evening mass and going out for dinner afterwards. as we drove toward home, we stopped at the town and country and picked up a gallon of milk and a case of pepsi for the house and i picked up a pack of cigarettes.  as we headed home and talked amongst ourselves about the week ahead.  as we approached grandfalls, my wife asked me if i could see that plane in the sky, i looked up and saw a large, intensely bright, white light. i told her that the light could not be coming from an airplane since the nearest municipal airport was in monahans which was about 13 miles away and the nearest large airport was midland international about 50 miles away.  we watched as the light, changed shape from round, to more of a tear drop shaped and got lower and lower in the sky. 
my wife asked if it could be a helicopter, but i honestly dont remember seeing a helicopter out this way and this late at night. i told her it could be, but if it was it must belong to one of the oil companies and they must be checking the pipelines. we watched as the light got lower and lower and eventually came to rest behind the old power substation.  as we watched it land, the light eventually faded, but the sky around the power station got lit up like a spot light was being shown at the station.  we were curious and decided to take the road toward the substation and check it out for ourselves. we turned down 5th street and as we drive past the old power station we saw a large shiny object floating there. it stayed there for a few seconds then it shot off toward the north and looked like it shot over the water tower and toward the direction of monahans.
this scared my wife who demanded we go home and go home right now. she says she did not feel safe being there in the dark. i returned home and we talked about what we saw, but neither of us could really get any sleep.  the next morning as i headed out to work, i drove by the old power station and to my surprise; there was a big black circle where the object had been. i called my wife and she got upset that i had gone back. i looked up on the internet about this and it lead me here to this site and now here i am reporting this to you. i do not wished to be called, i have a reputation and a career to think about, this is a very small community and very tightly knit, i do not want people thinking that i am crazy. the old power station is easy to find and so is the circle that the object left.  this was something that we will never forget.
content.summary: A bright light that descended to the ground and left a mark

content.detailedDescription: Was driving, facing north. stopped at stop sign, saw bright blue object flash from left to right across the sky infront of us. was above the mountains, so it wasn't terribly near, but close enough to see. it didn't go in a curve or downwards as if it was falling. came out of blank sky, went in a perfectly straight line, left to right then dissapeared. i sat there and stared at it a moment then asked the other passenger if they saw it, she did too. we both stared around for a minute but saw nothing else.
content.summary: Blue light shot across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My family (husband, son & i) were driving home from celebrating christmas with my in-laws (driving west on i-10) and suddenly, out in the distance, high in the sky, a very wide range of the sky was lit up by a very bright blue light!  it lasted about 3-5 seconds and then after a 3-5 second pause, it lit up again for about another 3-5 seconds.  the skys were extremely clear before and after the blue light.  no lightening storm, rain, etc. it was really strange.  immediately after the light flash my husband and i fell silent for a few seconds, as if to process it...Then he yelled, "whoa!  did you see that?!"...Of course i had and answered, "uh yea...What was it?!".  we searched the sky for anything else unusual and found nothing???  our 6 yr old son was asleep in the back seat and didn't witness it.  we didn't see anything else unusual after that...But thought it was strange enough to mention to "someone"???
content.summary: Huge flash of bright blue (royal)/white light
